title: Biscuit Crumbs
body:
At the end of a hard shift in Peggy's factories, the workers like nothing more than playing a good old fashioned game of football with our biscuit tins, but this left us with a problem: what to do with all the broken biscuits?

Our finance department calculated we were wasting around 15 metric tons of biscuits per year, but we didn't want to spoil our sporty scamps' fun.

Our Biscuit Crumbs are just our usual biscuits but smaller! They come lovingly kicked into crumby goodness for all the family to enjoy.
